title: AI Business Mastery Blueprint
fullDescription: A comprehensive guide to the AI Business Mastery Blueprint. This 16-hour program empowers you to automate work, build smart assistants, and master over 20 essential AI tools for business growth and innovation.
benefits: 16-Hour Blueprint to Automate Work, Build Smart Assistants & Master 20+ Essential AI Tools
Unlock growth, efficiency, and innovation across teams
Learn from the Top 1% in AI
learningObjectives: Understand core Gen AI concepts (LLMs, NLP) and their business applications across HR, marketing, operations, and finance.
Build no-code AI products and MVPs using tools like Supabase and AI code generation.
Create custom AI bots and smart presentations using ChatGPT, Claude AI, Perplexity, and Gamma.
Develop AI automation strategies for business processes using Make.com and ChatGPT API.
Formulate an AI adoption strategy for an entire organization, including AI councils and training plans.

modules.title: Module 1: Generative AI Foundations & Business Applications
modules.content: Covers LLMs, neural networks, AI/ML distinctions, NLP fundamentals, prompt engineering, OpenRouter, and case studies in various business functions.

modules.title: Module 2: Building No-Code AI Products + MVP Execution
modules.content: Focuses on building internal tools with Supabase and AI, auto-generating code from business logic, frontend/backend/database integration with AI, and deploying a real MVP.

modules.title: Module 3: Custom AI Bots, Smart Decks & The Future of AI Agents
modules.content: Teaches creation of fine-tuned AI bots, building AI-powered presentations with various tools, business research, and understanding agentic workflows.

modules.title: Module 4: AI Automation & Organization-Wide Transformation
modules.content: Explores Make.com for process automation, ChatGPT API integration, compliance-aware AI adoption, creating AI councils, use case pipelines, training plans, and a simulation activity for a 6-month AI implementation plan.

description: What is LLM?, Neural networks, AI vs ML, supervised & unsupervised learning
Fundamentals of NLP, transformers, and correlation with LLMs
How LLMs work: prompt engineering and OpenRouter capabilities
Case studies: HR, marketing, operations, and finance
Stimulate AI outputs using prompts vs traditional coding

sessions.session: Building No-Code AI Products + MVP Execution
description: Build internal tools without writing code using Supabase & AI tools
Describe business logic in plain language to auto-generate code
Learn frontend, backend, and database integration with AI
Deploy a real MVP by the end of the session

sessions.session: Custom AI Bots, Smart Decks & The Future of AI Agents
description: Learn to create fine-tuned AI bots for custom use cases
Build AI decks using ChatGPT, Claude AI, Perplexity & Gamma
Conduct business research, create polished presentations
Understand agentic workflows, future roles for AI generalists
Use Make.com to automate business processes using triggers
Connect tools with ChatGPT API for seamless workflows
Build compliance-aware AI adoption strategies for entire orgs
Create AI councils, use case pipelines, and training plans
Simulation Activity: 6-month AI implementation plan for your business

refundPolicy: If you go through the program and feel it didn’t provide even a single actionable insight you can apply to your business right away, just email hi@growthschool.io after the event for a full refund.
certificateInfo: You will receive a certificate to validate your learnings and show practical, hands-on experience leveraging AI for real-world marketing challenges.

faqs.question: Is this program suitable for non-technical business professionals?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The blueprint focuses on no-code/low-code AI tools and strategic applications, making it accessible and valuable for those without a deep technical background.

faqs.question: What tangible skills can I expect to develop?
faqs.answer: You'll learn to automate tasks, build simple AI tools and bots without coding, create AI-driven presentations, and develop a strategic plan for AI integration in your business or team.
